title: Kaia Gerber and Pete Davidson avoid bumping into each other at event
text:
Kaia trying really hard to pretend Pete’s not there (Picture: James Devaney/Getty Images)

Rumoured couple Kaia Gerber and Pete Davidson were spotted at the New York Knicks game… but sat separately.

The duo was spotted enjoying a brunch date last week a few hours after he reportedly did the walk of shame out of her apartment.

This time, the 18-year-old model and 25-year-old comedian attended the game at Madison Square Garden in New York City seated far apart from each other.

Maybe it’s because Kaia went with her dad Rande Gerber and it would have been awkward for everyone involved.

However, we would have loved to watch the entire ordeal.

Kaia was looking professional while wearing an oversized grey blazer with blue jeans while Pete opted for a blinding orange jacket and black jeans.

The model and her father were over the moon as their team the Chicago Bulls made their first win of the season.

Pete showing off his muscles (or cheering) (Picture: James Devaney/Getty Images)

The model was completely engrossed in the game (Picture: James Devaney/Getty Images)

Pete was just as ecstatic as he got up and cheered while sat courtside with his friends.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The comedian has sparked rumours that he is dating Kaia after the pair were pictured enjoying a cosy lunch date last week.

Brooklyn student Rose Farkash papped the two mysterious ‘lovebirds’ having lunch in New York eatery Sadelle’s, with the stars sitting in a corner booth.

Kaia – the model daughter of Cindy Crawford and Rande – was dressed casually in a green jumper, and was seen on her phone while Pete was pictured laughing.

The Saturday Night Live star was dressed in a grey sweatshirt – although oddly enough, Pete was wearing an entirely different outfit earlier in the day, while apparently leaving Kaia’s apartment.

Actual picture of Pete telling the boys (we’d like to think) about Kaia (Picture: James Devaney/Getty Images)

Apparently, the two are just ‘friends’ but we don’t usually leave our friends’ houses looking as inconspicuous as possible.

If anyone moves on fast, it’s Pete after being previously engaged to Ariana Grande before being linked to 46-year-old Kate Beckinsale back in April this year.

Most recently, the SNL star had a whirlwind romance with Margaret Qualley, 25, before the two suddenly ended it.

We’re just going to have to wait and see if the two make it official.

description: Rumoured couple Kaia Gerber and Pete Davidson both went to the same basketball game in New York City but attended without one another.
